column4: hi, just installed xubuntu on a laptop with a partitioned hdd (partitioned in 2 parts) now it only sees the partion on which xubuntu's installed. i checked the dimensions and it didnt melt them together, the 2nd partition simply disappeared... help?
ubuntu won't mount the second partition unless you tell it to. look in nautilus. you should see an icon indicating an unmounted partition (30 GB Media, or something like that.)
thanks but i knew that already, and i also checked in "system monitor" the partition is not there at all
does it get listed when you run fdisk -l ?
